text.0:
False information is created much faster and at a much greater volume than a human can possibly keep up with. But will this always be the case?

:robot_face: We discuss artificial intelligence's role in the future of fact checking on this week's Full Fact Podcast :backhand_index_pointing_down:
https://t.co/EUp8vL8wwj
text.1:
A video claiming that cells from an aborted foetus are present in a Covid-19 vaccine are false. 

Some cells derived from foetal cells are used to produce the vaccine, but cells from a foetus won’t actually be in the vaccine.

https://t.co/7tafuFOaxr
